title: 450-B
statement: B. Jzzhu and Sequencestime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutJzzhu has invented a kind of sequences, they meet the following property:You are givenxandy, please calculatefnmodulo1000000007(109+ 7).InputThe first line contains two integersxandy(|x|, |y| ≤ 109). The second line contains a single integern(1 ≤n≤ 2·109).OutputOutput a single integer representingfnmodulo1000000007(109+ 7).ExamplesInput2 33Output1Input0 -12Output1000000006NoteIn the first sample,f2=f1+f3,3 = 2 +f3,f3= 1.In the second sample,f2=  - 1;- 1modulo(109+ 7)equals(109+ 6).
